protein.specific_function: Binds phospholipids; exhibits strong binding to phosphatidic acid and weak binding to phosphatidylinositol 3- phosphate

reference.reference_text: Xu Y, Liu Y, Ridgway ND, McMaster CR: Novel members of the human oxysterol-binding protein family bind phospholipids and regulate vesicle transport. J Biol Chem. 2001 May 25;276(21):18407-14. Epub 2001 Feb 26.
